}}'''Belba Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Belba was the eldest daughter, and second-oldest child, of [[Mungo Baggins]] and [[Laura Grubb]]. This made her the aunt of [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]]. She married [[Rudigar Bolger]], and they had one child together, [[Herugar Bolger|Herugar]], the grandfather of Fredegar.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref> 

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2003: [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]]:'''
:Five portraits are clustered on a wall in [[Bag End]]. One of them is Belba, and one of Bilbo's lines when looking at the portraits is "That's my Aunt Belba".
